page.title: 15ARCHAELOGY
page.content: THE TOWN LIES IN AN AREA RICH IN PREHISTORIC,ROMAN AND PAGAN SAXON SETTLEMENT ON THE RIVER GRAVELS.ROMAN POTTERY AND SAXON HUTS HAVE BEEN FOUND IN THE GRAVEL PIT NORTH OF NEWLAND AND PAGAN SAXON INHUMANATION CEMETARY WAS ALSO DISCOVERED NEARBY.GRAVE GOODS INCLUDED SHIELDS BOSSES,SPEARS AND KNIVES MORE SAXON HUTS AND A VARIETY OF PREHISTORIC FEATURES WERE EXCAVATED NORTH OF THE TOWN AT CITY FARM,AND EXCAVATIONS ON THE SITE OF THE ABBEY HAVE PRODUCED PREHISTORIC,ROMAN AND SAXON MATERIAL. BY ALEX HOLMES AND JAKE MAYO
